title: Lakshmi Kasula Pearl Choker - Devotional Elegance
materials: Polki Diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: Multi-strand pearl choker featuring a central Kasula pendant (Lakshmi motif) studded with dazzling Polki diamonds and outlined with vibrant rubies. Delicate ruby droplets enhance the pendant's elegance. Lotus shaped ruby additions on either side of the pendant blend tradition and modern style.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
or any special event where you want to exude timeless grace.
description: This choker seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern aesthetics. The use of high-quality pearls and Polki diamonds ensures a luxurious feel and lasting beauty. The Lakshmi Kasula pendant is a symbol of prosperity and good fortune, making this piece a treasured heirloom. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and the renowned Hyderabadi polish, this is a true statement of refined elegance.
